title: Angel Stadium
description: The home of my hometown team, Angel Stadium is the 4th oldest active stadium and as a very cozy feeling with plenty of parking.

title: Petco Park
description: Nestled in the heart of downtown San Diego, Petco Park is a hub for fans of baseball and those who just want to have a nice drink in the park.

title: Oracle Park
description: Parked right on the San Franciso Bay in the famed McCovey Cove, Oracel Park is my personal favorite ballpark with stunning views and Gilroy Garlic Fries.

title: Werner Park
description: My first ever minor league stadium visited, the Werner Park is a quaint stadium just outside Omaha that boast great views of the field for low, family-friendly prices.

title: Kauffman Stadium
description: Right across the street from Arrowhead Stadium, Kauffman Stadium boasts a crown shaped scoreboard and water displays for every homerun. I was very hot when I visited.

title: Citi Field
description: Right across from the U.S Open Tennis Complex in Flushing, NY, Citi Field had the loudest and most passionate fans when I visited.

title: Tokyo Dome
description: A storied field in Japan, its roof is held up by a difference in air pressure resulting in a pop of ears and a huge gust of wind when exiting the stadium.

title: Dodger Stadium
description: Even though they are 2 of my least favorite teams in MLB, I went to Dodgers Stadium with the only goal to check off that I visited. I wore Giants gear when I went.

title: Oakland Coliseum
description: Easily the worst park I visited, I only went to say that I gone as the Athletics have since re-located to Sacramento in preparation for a permanent move to Las Vegas.

title: T-Mobile Park
description: The only park I have visited with the retractable roof, T-Mobile Park had the best in-stadium food options as I had a katsu curry in my seat.

title: Fenway Park
description: The coolest ballpark I went to, the highlight of the day was singing Sweet Caroline during the 7th inning stretch. The Red Sox somehow lost to the 2024 White Sox that day.
